meanings.definition: The quality of being kind and giving.
meanings.sent1: Her generousnesses towards others always shines through in her actions.
meanings.sent2: The community greatly appreciates the generousnesses of the local charity.
meanings.sent3: His generousnesses in sharing his snacks with his friends made him quite popular.
meanings.sent4: The generousnesses of the sun, providing warmth and light to all, is like a comforting hug.
meanings.sent5: The generousnesses of the river, freely giving water to the thirsty land, sustains life around it.

meanings.sent1: The generousnesses of the donors helped fund the new school library.
meanings.sent2: Random acts of generousnesses can truly brighten someone's day.
meanings.sent3: The generousnesses of the puppy, bringing toys to its owner, were adorable.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of clouds, her smile was a ray of generousnesses.
meanings.sent5: The generousnesses of the tree, offering shade to all, was a welcome relief on a hot day.

meanings.sent1: His generousnesses knew no bounds, always willing to help those in need.
meanings.sent2: The generousnesses of her spirit made her a beloved figure in the community.
meanings.sent3: The generousnesses of the cat, sharing its warmth with the other pets, was heartwarming.
meanings.sent4: The generousnesses of the wind, carrying seeds far and wide, symbolized growth and opportunity.
meanings.sent5: The generousnesses of the fire, providing light and heat, brought comfort to the cold night.
